DOC.brief_summary: Few studies have reported the efficacy of adding dexmedetomidine to bupivacain for fascia illiaca compartment black. Comparison of dexmedetomidine and bupivacaine with bupivacaine alone on the quality of ultrasonography guided fascia iliaca compartment block in adults undergoing femur fracture fixation surgery at 2014.
DOC.brief_title: Dexmedetomidine and Bupivacaine With Bupivacaine in Ultrasonography Guided Fascia Iliaca Compartment Block in Adults
DOC.criteria: Adults with femural fracture Hypersensitivity to drugs Neurological diseases Coagulation abnormalities Infection at the site of block
